content: handsome cable pumpkin materials orange worsted weight yarn ~600 yds such as caron simply soft in persimmon brown worsted weight yarn ~25 yds such as lily sugar n cream in warm brown stiff yarn will help the stem hold its shape size 2 dpns size 6 circular needles 16 or 24 inches cable needle or extra dpn stitch markers stuffing crochet hook or darning needle abbreviations cable x y slip the first number of stitches x onto cable needle and hold behind knit the second number of stitches y from the left needle onto the right knit the stitches from the cable needle onto the right needle all cables will be held behind k knit p purl increase increase k2tog knit 2 together decrease ssk slip slip knit decrease p2tog purl 2 together decrease instructions page 1 of 4 to cast on create a slip knot with orange yarn where the short tail can be pulled to tighten make 6 single crochets into the slip knot but leave the loops on your crochet hook and transfer to double pointed needles tighten the slip knot or cast on 6 stitches however you like and sew up the opening at the end round 1 k6 round 2 *k1 inc1 repeat from * to end from here instructions will be given for 1/12th of the pumpkin repeat instructions for each round 12x stitch counts for each section and total stitch count will be given you may choose to place stitch markers between each section round pattern repeat 12
